segments.text: What are you having for lunch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got a sandwich , some chips , and a soda .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you bring that from home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got it from the cafeteria .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of sandwich did you get ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They messed up my order and gave me a bologna sandwich .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Considering it wasn't what I ordered , it was still pretty good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I got a sandwich there once before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , and they didn't get my order right either .
segments.speaker: S1
